aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs16 The company will pay for direct physical loss of or damage to glass, lettering and ornamentation, caused by breakage of glass or by chemicals accidentally or maliciously applied.\par \par The company will also pay for\par \pard\li720 repairing or replacing frames immedialtely\par installing temporary plates\par removing or replacing any obstructions\par \pard\par \cf1\b Exclusions\par \b0 Insurance provided by this endorsement does not apply to loss caused by or due to fire.\par \par \b Conditions\par \b0 The limit of the company's liability for damage shall not exceed the actual cash value of the property at the time of loss, nor what it would cost to repair or replace the damaged property with other property .\par The company may pay for the loss in money or may repair or replace the property.\cf0\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Apartment Building-Glass Coverage Form
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Apartment Building-Glass Coverage Form
